price: On the Day when He calls you, you will respond by praising Him, thinking that you had not stayed [on earth] except for a little while.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُوكُمۡ فَتَسۡتَجِيبُونَ بِحَمۡدِهِۦ وَتَظُنُّونَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
